typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRating
AggregateComedyRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
